Name: Devil Girl Needs Massages
About the game: [DEVIL GIRL NEEDS YOUR MASSAGE] Devil Girl, Heroine of this Manga book, has no Mana. She needs to recharge her Mana. Devils of this book can recharge Mana by getting humanâ€™s touch. You are the only one who can recharge Mana of this Devil Girl. Give her your Massage and make her Mana full [HOW TO PLAY] You can use 5-types of massage skills(Hand Massage, Spanking Massage, Viberator Massage, Electric Massage, Oil Massaage). You have to use the massage skill that Devil Girl wants to get. If Devil Girl's Mana is fully recharged, you can go the next page! [PLAY GUIDE] 1. Watch carefully what massage Devil Girl wants. She wants Electric Massage! 2. Give her what she wants. Press 'F' to give her Electric Massage. 3. She loves it! Also, you can see her Mana increase(purple-color background)
